description: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokemon flinch with each hit.
Summons rain that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.
Raises Speed one stage after each turn.
Protects against critical hits.
Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.
Prevents Self-Destruct, Explosion, and Aftermath from working while the Pokemon is in battle.
Prevents Paralysis.
Increases Evasion to 1.25 during a sandstorm. Protects against sandstorm damage.

Prevents sleep.

Prevents poison.
Protects against Fire moves.  Once one has been blocked, the Pokemon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5 damage until it leaves battle.
Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.
Prevents confusion
Prevents being forced out of battle by other Pokemon's moves.
Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.
Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.

Has a 30% chance of inflcting either paralysis, poison, or sleep on attacking Pokemon on contact.
Copies burns, paralysis, and poison received onto the Pokemon that inflicted them.
Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokemon.
Cures any major status ailment upon switching out.

Prevents accuracy from being lowered.
